Replace.Text: The navy canteen run by Akashi is very popular among ship girls. Independent building, after completion [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route +1

Each trade route [ICON_TradeRoute] provides +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins + 2 [ICON_Production] productivity + 2 [ICON_Food] food + 2 [ICON_Faith] faith. International trade routes provide +2 Culture [ICON_Culture]. Each coast and lake tile in the city has +1 [ICON_Gold] gold, +1 [ICON_Faith] +1 [ICON_Production] productivity. Merchant [ICON_TradeRoute] increases the trade range of water transport by 50%

[ICON_TradeRoute] Trader units will not be looted. The [ICON_Gold] gold coin production of all cities is +20%, but the production of military units is -15% [ICON_Production] productivity. [ICON_GreatMerchant] The number of times the Great Merchant can be used +1. Has a unique building, the Navy Mess Hall

Akashi Commissary. The business covers the material trade of the entire port area. Non-professional areas that replace business centers without population restrictions. Complete Municipal Foreign Trade to unlock. Once built, the city can use Faith to purchase merchants and ranged units. Adjacent areas provide a standard [ICON_Gold] gold coin bonus, rivers provide an additional +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacency bonus, Azur Trade Port provides an additional large [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacency bonus, and each luxury resource provides a large amount of [ICON_Gold ] Gold coin adjacent bonus. Provides substantial adjacency bonus to Industrial Zone [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE]

Replace the port. A port specializing in trade. After the first construction is completed, the technology "Shipbuilding" is unlocked. Adjacent areas provide a large amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonuses, Akashi's canteen provides an additional large amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coin bonuses, and each mental maintenance station improvement provides a large amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coin bonuses. Provides substantial adjacency bonus to Industrial Zone [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE]
+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold coins from adjacent area bonus
+1 [ICON_Gold] gold from additional adjacent river bonus
+ 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent luxury resource bonus
+ 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins from the adjacent Azure Trade Port
+2[ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent mental maintenance station
+ 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent area bonus
+ 2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins from the adjacent Akashi concession stand
+ 2 [ICON_Production] Production from the adjacent Akashi Commissary
+ 2 [ICON_Production] production from adjacent Azur Trade Port

A mental maintenance station established by Manju on the sea. +3[ICON_Gold] gold coins +2[ICON_Production] productivity. Provides +2 [ICON_Gold] adjacent bonus to Azur Trading Port when adjacent to Azur Trading Port. Only one Mental Maintenance Station can be built in a city. With the development of technology and municipal administration, there will be more bonuses
The navy canteen run by Akashi is very popular among ship girls. Independent building, after completion [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route +1
After the KANSENs united, Akashi led the Hong Kong-wide business alliance with his outstanding business capabilities. The Hong Kong Business Alliance is about to unite towards a brighter future.

The unprecedented unity in the port area heralds a legendary era for ship girls. Akashi, your wisdom and cunning will lead a huge business alliance. Allocate resources, open ports, and make money. Use your business talents to lead the ship girls to the stars and the sea!
of the Port District Business Alliance

Special naval ranged unit unlocked by Navigation. It has higher mobility and can perform long-range attacks up to 2[ICON_Ranged] blocks away. With 2 [ICON_Charges] labor points, you can harvest resources or build some improved facilities. Characteristic improved mental maintenance stations can be built.

Special naval ranged unit unlocked by Navigation. It has higher mobility and can perform long-range attacks up to 2[ICON_Ranged] blocks away. With 2 [ICON_Charges] labor points, you can harvest resources or build some improved facilities. Characteristic improved mental maintenance stations can be built.
